events.event_description: Join us Sunday, December 22 at 10:30am as we celebrate the birth of the greatest gift the world has ever known. And don't forget to bring a friend!

services.event_description: You can always look forward to our regular worship service! Join us every Sunday at 10:30am as we come together and worship the Lord!
Our W.O.W. service is a mid-week worship service to help get us all through the week. It's a great time of fellowship and praise and we would love to see you there!
Getting together in small groups and discussing the Word of God is a great way to learn and grow closer as a church community. Ask us about our small group studies.
